name: Thibaudeau’s Pendulum Wave Approach
overview_and_execution: Rotate different wave schemes each week (e.g., 7-5-3, then 5-3-1, then 3-2-1, etc.) to keep variety high and stimulate different strength and hypertrophy adaptations.
important_notes: Frequent variation helps avoid plateaus. Each weekly wave is performed similarly—start conservatively, add weight each set within the wave.
volume_metrics: Varies each week according to the chosen wave rep scheme.
